Fetch Data from an API using Azure Functions & Integrate with ADF

Objective: Use an Azure Function to fetch data from a sample API (e.g., a public JSON placeholder API) and store it in Azure Blob Storage. Then, utilize ADF to move this data to a desired sink (e.g., Azure SQL Database).
ADF will execute a python function to calculate the cube of a number
get count of files in a folder on blob storage
